intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to CatchUp. We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site.

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.content: The data controller responsible for your personal data is the company operating this website. For the data controller information, please refer to the "Contact Us" section at the end of this policy.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.intro: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect on the Site includes:
collection.personal: Personal Data: Personally identifiable information, such as your name, email address, and telephone number, and demographic information, such as your age, gender, hometown, and interests, that you voluntarily give to us when you register with the Site or when you choose to participate in various activities related to the Site.
collection.derivative: Derivative Data: Information our servers automatically collect when you access the Site, such as your IP address, your browser type, your operating system, your access times, and the pages you have viewed directly before and after accessing the Site.
collection.social: Data From Social Networks: User information from social networking sites, including your name, your social network username, email address and profile picture, if you connect your account to such social networks.

use.title: Use of Your Information
use.intro: Having accurate information about you permits us to provide you with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience. Specifically, we may use information collected about you via the Site to:
list: Send you administrative information, such as information about changes to our terms, conditions, and policies.
Understand and analyze how you use our Site and services, which can improve our overall functionality.

Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the Site, and for marketing and promotional purposes.
Detect and prevent fraudulent transactions and other illegal activities.

disclosure.title: Disclosure of Your Information
disclosure.intro: We may share information we have collected about you in certain situations. Your information may be disclosed as follows:
items: By Law or to Protect Rights: If we believe the release of information about you is necessary to respond to legal process, to investigate or remedy potential violations of our policies, or to protect the rights, property, and safety of others, we may share your information as permitted or required by any applicable law, rule, or regulation.

Business Transfers: We may share or transfer your information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business to another company.

Third-Party Service Providers: We may share your information with third parties that perform services for us or on our behalf, including data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, customer service, and marketing assistance.

security.title: Security of Your Information
security.content: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable, and no method of data transmission can be guaranteed against any interception or other type of misuse.

children.title: Policy for Children
children.content: We do not knowingly solicit information from or market to children under the age of 13. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under age 13 without verification of parental consent, we will delete that information as quickly as possible. If you believe we might have any information from or about a child under 13, please contact us.

rights.title: User Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights concerning your data:
list: Right to Access: You can request information about the personal data we hold about you.
Right to Rectification: You have the right to request correction of inaccurate personal data we have about you.
Right to Erasure: You can request that we delete your personal data.
Right to Restrict Processing: You have the right to request the restriction of processing your personal data.
Right to Data Portability: You can request a copy of your personal data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.
Right to Object: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data.
rights.footer: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time in order to reflect, for example, changes to our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contact.content: If you have questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, please go to "Contact Us" page on this website, or contact us at:

refund_policy.title: CatchUp Refund Policy
refund_policy.intro: Thank you for choosing our product/service. We provide secure payment services through Paddle and are committed to providing customers with a good purchasing experience. The following is our refund policy:

cancellation.title: 1. Consumer Cancellation Rights
cancellation.content: If you are a consumer, you have the right to cancel this agreement and return the product within 14 days without giving any reason. The cancellation period will expire 14 days after the day the transaction is completed. To meet the cancellation deadline, you just need to send your communication concerning your exercise of the right to cancel to Paddle before the cancellation period has expired.

discretion.title: 2. Refund Discretion
discretion.content:
Refunds will be determined entirely by our Merchant of Record, Paddle. If you believe you have a valid reason for a refund, please apply at paddle.net. Refund requests may be rejected depending on the circumstances. If Paddle finds evidence of fraud, refund abuse, or other manipulative behavior that entitles Paddle to a counterclaim, Paddle will reject the refund request.

You can also learn more about refund and dispute policies in Paddle's 'Checkout Buyer Terms and Conditions'.

process.title: 3. Refund Application Process
process.content: If you meet the above refund conditions, please submit an application within 14 days of purchase and provide the following information:
list: Reason for refund and relevant screenshots (if applicable)
process.note: Our order and payment process is handled by the online reseller Paddle. Paddle is the Merchant of Record for all our orders. Paddle also handles all customer service-related matters and returns. If you encounter any problems during the payment process, please visit paddle.net.

merchant.title: 4. Paddle as Merchant
merchant.content: Our payments and order processing are handled by our third-party partner Paddle.com. Paddle is our authorized merchant, and all transaction records and refund processes are handled by Paddle and comply with its policies. In case of disputes or additional refund requests, Paddle may also assist as a neutral party in the review. For detailed consumer rights and service policies, please see Paddle's 'Checkout Buyer Terms and Conditions'.

terms_of_service.title: CatchUp Terms of Service
terms_of_service.intro: Welcome to CatchUp (hereinafter referred to as 'the Service' or 'we'). The Service provides automated summaries of subscribed channel content and related features. By using the Service, you agree to comply with the following terms. Please read these terms carefully before use.

scope.title: 1. Scope and Eligibility
content: The Service is available to users worldwide, allowing access to CatchUp features from anywhere.
However, you must ensure your use complies with local laws and regulations and assume responsibility for compliance.
We reserve the right to limit or terminate your access if local regulations change preventing the operation or provision of the Service.

account.title: 2. Registration and Account
content: Age Limit: You must be at least 18 years old, or of legal age in your jurisdiction, to register and use the Service.
Account Info: You must provide accurate and complete personal information during registration and keep it updated.

Account Security: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials (e.g., username, password) and not sharing them. We are not liable for misuse due to your negligence.
Termination: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if we detect violations (e.g., API abuse, illegal acts, spamming) and may pursue legal action.

payment.title: 3. Payment and Subscription
content: Plans: We offer Free and Paid subscription plans. Details and pricing are available on the website or subscription page.
Payment Methods: We accept credit cards and other payment methods, which may vary by region.
Refund Policy: Paid amounts are non-refundable, but you retain access until the end of the billing cycle. For refund requests due to disputes, please see our Refund Policy.
Auto-Renewal: Paid plans automatically renew. Unless cancelled before the expiration date, the system will automatically charge your payment method.

usage.title: 4. Usage Regulations
usage.intro: Legal Use: You agree to use the Service legally and compliantly. You must NOT:
list: Engage in unauthorized data scraping or API abuse that burdens CatchUp servers.
Attempt to hack, attack, or disrupt the normal operation of the Service.
Publish or disseminate illegal or inappropriate content (e.g., hate speech, pornography, violence).
Infringe upon others' rights (including intellectual property, privacy, trademarks, etc.).
usage.penalty: Penalty: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account for violations and pursue legal action.

disclaimer.title: 5. Disclaimer
content: Data Accuracy: The Service relies on AI and public data. While we strive for accuracy, we cannot guarantee 100% accuracy due to source changes or AI limitations.

Availability: We strive for stability but are not liable for interruptions due to technical issues, third-party changes, or force majeure. We reserve the right to modify or terminate the Service without compensation.
Liability Limitation: Use is at your own risk. We are not liable for direct, indirect, incidental, or punitive damages. We are not liable for third-party services (e.g., payment processing).

changes.title: 6. Changes and Termination
content: Changes: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Modified terms will be published on the website and take effect immediately.
Termination: If you disagree with updated terms, stop using the Service immediately. Continued use implies acceptance. We may terminate your account for violations without notice or refund.

privacy.title: 7. Privacy Policy
privacy.content: We respect your privacy and protect your personal data according to our Privacy Policy. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for details.

law.title: 8. Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
content: These terms apply worldwide. If local law prohibits the Service, we reserve the right to limit it.
In case of disputes, you agree to first attempt friendly negotiation.
If negotiation fails, disputes will be submitted to the designated jurisdiction for arbitration or litigation.

contact.content: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us.
